文献ID: STP1023-EB-Zirconium in the Nuclear Industry_8th Volume_020_chunk1
证据片段: Internal hydriding of Zircaloy cladding is a persistent cause of cladding failures

文献ID: STP1023-EB-Zirconium in the Nuclear Industry_8th Volume_020_chunk1
证据片段: Hydrogen pickup in Zircaloy fuel rods falls into three categories: expected because of corrosion, accelerated, and massive

文献ID: STP1023-EB-Zirconium in the Nuclear Industry_8th Volume_020_chunk1
证据片段: Both accelerated and massive hydriding occurred at remote locations from the defect

文献ID: STP1023-EB-Zirconium in the Nuclear Industry_8th Volume_020_chunk2
证据片段: Hydrides in the vicinity of the defect hole were generally low in concentration with typical uniform levels of about 100 ppm

文献ID: STP1023-EB-Zirconium in the Nuclear Industry_8th Volume_020_chunk2
证据片段: hydrogen concentrations ranged from <100 ppm near the inner surface to several hundred parts per million (ppm) or more near the outer surface

文献ID: STP1023-EB-Zirconium in the Nuclear Industry_8th Volume_020_chunk3
证据片段: Defected fuel rod; Temperature, K: 672; Time, h: 1224; Pit, mm: 5.2 × 10³; Measured pH2/PH20: 5 × 10⁻²; Critical pH2/PHo: 1.5 × 10³; Observation: normal corrosion and accelerated hydriding

文献ID: STP1023-EB-Zirconium in the Nuclear Industry_8th Volume_020_chunk3
证据片段: Capsule; Temperature, K: 593; Time, h: 40; PH{2, mm: 760; Measured pH2/PH2: 1.25 × 10³; Critical pH2/P: 4.2 × 10²; Observation: no massive hydriding

文献ID: STP1023-EB-Zirconium in the Nuclear Industry_8th Volume_020_chunk3
证据片段: Capsule; Temperature, K: 591; Time, h: 21; PH{2, mm: 760; Measured pH2/PH2: 2.0 × 10³; Critical pH2/P: 4.2 × 10²; Observation: massive hydriding limited to end cap

文献ID: STP1023-EB-Zirconium in the Nuclear Industry_8th Volume_020_chunk3
证据片段: Capsule; Temperature, K: 593; Time, h: 12; PH{2, mm: 760; Measured pH2/PH2: 3.3 × 10; Critical pH2/P: 4.2 × 10²; Observation: crevice regions massive hydriding in crevice regions

文献ID: STP1023-EB-Zirconium in the Nuclear Industry_8th Volume_020_chunk3
证据片段: Capsule; Temperature, K: 583; Time, h: 6; PH{2, mm: 760; Measured pH2/PH2: >107; Critical pH2/P: 4.2 × 10²; Observation: massive hydriding distributed uniformly along crevice

文献ID: STP1023-EB-Zirconium in the Nuclear Industry_8th Volume_020_chunk3
证据片段: Tubingh; Temperature, K: 573; Time, h: 6; PH{2, mm: 760; Measured pH2/PH2: 10³ to 10; Critical pH2/P: 4.2 × 10²; Observation: accelerated hydriding

文献ID: STP1023-EB-Zirconium in the Nuclear Industry_8th Volume_020_chunk4
证据片段: Vapor-blasted, 673 K, 72 h, PH{, mm: 0.1, Measured pH2/PH20: 1, Critical PH2/PH2: 1.1, Observation: no hydriding

文献ID: STP1023-EB-Zirconium in the Nuclear Industry_8th Volume_020_chunk4
证据片段: Etched, autoclaved, scratched, 623 K, 1008 h, PH{, mm: 0.4, Measured pH2/PH20: 5, Critical PH2/PH2: 2.7, Observation: normal corrosion

文献ID: STP1023-EB-Zirconium in the Nuclear Industry_8th Volume_020_chunk4
证据片段: Etched, 573 K, 1008 h, PH{, mm: 0.4, Measured pH2/PH20: 5, Critical PH2/PH2: 2.7, Observation: normal corrosion hydridng

文献ID: STP1023-EB-Zirconium in the Nuclear Industry_8th Volume_020_chunk5
证据片段: Most out-of-pile hydriding tests of Zircaloy in H₂/H₂O atmospheres were performed on coupons and on chip specimens

文献ID: STP1023-EB-Zirconium in the Nuclear Industry_8th Volume_020_chunk5
证据片段: Hydriding, often premature, was initiated at the sharp corners and edges of the Zircaloy coupons

文献ID: STP1023-EB-Zirconium in the Nuclear Industry_8th Volume_020_chunk5
证据片段: the surface films can be listed in the following order of decreasing protection: prefilmed/autoclaved > etched > vapor blasted

文献ID: STP1023-EB-Zirconium in the Nuclear Industry_8th Volume_020_chunk5
证据片段: In some tests, even scratched autoclaved surfaces were protective in the H₂-H₂O atmospheres

文献ID: STP1023-EB-Zirconium in the Nuclear Industry_8th Volume_020_chunk5
证据片段: accelerated and heavy localized hydriding were produced in etched Zircaloy surfaces by scratching the room temperature film and exposing the specimens to pure hydrogen

文献ID: STP1023-EB-Zirconium in the Nuclear Industry_8th Volume_020_chunk5
证据片段: Specimen characteristics such as geometry and surface condition, as well as environmental factors, such as hydrogen pressure, test temperature. and test time, affect the amount of hydrogen pickup

文献ID: STP1023-EB-Zirconium in the Nuclear Industry_8th Volume_020_chunk5
证据片段: Specimen geometry: Coupons > tubing > spheres

文献ID: STP1023-EB-Zirconium in the Nuclear Industry_8th Volume_020_chunk5
证据片段: Zircaloy surface: Abraded > etched > prefilmed

文献ID: STP1023-EB-Zirconium in the Nuclear Industry_8th Volume_020_chunk6
证据片段: pickup fraction of Zircaloy-2 depends somewhat on the oxygen content of the water or steam, it is usually between 10 and 50%

文献ID: STP1023-EB-Zirconium in the Nuclear Industry_8th Volume_020_chunk6
证据片段: Zircaloy-4 has a pickup fraction between 5 and 25%

文献ID: STP1023-EB-Zirconium in the Nuclear Industry_8th Volume_020_chunk6
证据片段: The coolant in pressurized water reactors contains some dissolved hydrogen (10 to 60 cm³/kg)

文献ID: STP1023-EB-Zirconium in the Nuclear Industry_8th Volume_020_chunk6
证据片段: porous thicker oxide with higher hydrogen contents consisted of monoclinic and metastable tetragonal zirconia

文献ID: STP1023-EB-Zirconium in the Nuclear Industry_8th Volume_020_chunk6
证据片段: Two of the LWBR intentionally defected seed-type irradiation test rods had areas of accelerated and massive hydriding in their plenum regions

文献ID: STP1023-EB-Zirconium in the Nuclear Industry_8th Volume_020_chunk7
证据片段: Electron microprobe examination identified Inconel X-750 constituents (nickel, chromium, iron, and titanium) on the hydrided inside cladding surface

文献ID: STP1023-EB-Zirconium in the Nuclear Industry_8th Volume_020_chunk7
证据片段: Inconel-600 from LWBR fuel module baseplates can smear and mechanically bond to the bearing surfaces of Zircaloy-4

文献ID: STP1023-EB-Zirconium in the Nuclear Industry_8th Volume_020_chunk7
证据片段: nickel-alloy smearing resulted in subsequent accelerated hydriding on exposure to LWBR coolant conditions

文献ID: STP1023-EB-Zirconium in the Nuclear Industry_8th Volume_020_chunk7
证据片段: The nickel contents of Inconel-600 $( 7 6 \mathrm { \ : w t } \% )$ and Inconel X-750 $7 0 \mathrm { \ w t \% }$ minimum) are similar

文献ID: STP1023-EB-Zirconium in the Nuclear Industry_8th Volume_020_chunk8
证据片段: specimen characteristics (geometry and surface conditions) as well as environmental factors (hydrogen pressure, test temperature, and test time) affect the amount of hydrogen pickup in Zircaloy

文献ID: STP1023-EB-Zirconium in the Nuclear Industry_8th Volume_020_chunk8
证据片段: The significant factors affecting internal hydriding in defected Zircaloy rods are defect size, sources of hydrogen, Zircaloy cladding inside surface properties, aggressive fission product attack on inner oxide film, nickel alloy contamination of Zircaloy, and the effects of heat flux and fluence

文献ID: STP1023-EB-Zirconium in the Nuclear Industry_8th Volume_020_chunk9
证据片段: Out-of-reactor corrosion tests in 10.3-MPa steam at temperatures between 490 and 530°C have been carried out on Zircaloy-2 tube specimens

文献ID: STP1023-EB-Zirconium in the Nuclear Industry_8th Volume_020_chunk9
证据片段: Out-of-reactor corrosion tests in 10.3-MPa steam at temperatures between 490 and 530°C have been carried out on Zircaloy-2 tube specimens

文献ID: STP1023-EB-Zirconium in the Nuclear Industry_8th Volume_020_chunk10
证据片段: The number density and size of nodules increased when tested at higher temperatures.

文献ID: STP1023-EB-Zirconium in the Nuclear Industry_8th Volume_020_chunk10
证据片段: Extending the test duration increased the nodule size, but not the number density.

文献ID: STP1023-EB-Zirconium in the Nuclear Industry_8th Volume_020_chunk10
证据片段: The archive tube lots showed different degrees of nodular corrosion in the out-of-reactor test

文献ID: STP1023-EB-Zirconium in the Nuclear Industry_8th Volume_020_chunk10
证据片段: A higher number density of precipitates tended to reduce the nodular corrosion susceptibility.
